languages.text: {n}Губернатор Драйвстем выдерживает паузу, осмысляя услышанное.{/n} "Сколь прискорбная весть, Ваша Светлость... полагаю, род Гапрак ждет официальное расследование? Напомню, что они находятся в особо близких сношениях с {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g} и оказывают протекцию Кьяве Гамма. Не пытаюсь оправдать преступников, Ваша Светлость, однако мне видится, что вспышка ереси на Кьяве едва ли может быть деянием благородного семейства, теряющего с утратой индустриального мира львиную долю своего богатства..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Губернатор Драйвстем выдерживает паузу, осмысляя услышанное.{/n} "Сколь прискорбная весть, Ваша Светлость... полагаю, род Гапрак ждет официальное расследование? Напомню, что они находятся в особо близких сношениях с Адептус Механикус и оказывают протекцию Кьяве Гамма. Не пытаюсь оправдать преступников, ваше сиятельство, однако мне видится, что вспышка ереси на Кьяве едва ли может быть деянием благородного семейства, теряющего с утратой индустриального мира львиную долю своего богатства..."

languages.text: {n}Drivestem pauses, mulling over the gravity of your words.{/n} "Such woeful tidings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I assume that House Gaprak is in for an official investigation? If I may remind you, they have particularly close ties to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} and serve as patrons of Kiava Gamma. Not to speak in the defence of criminals, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but from where I stand, the outbreak of heresy on Kiava could hardly have been perpetrated by a noble family who stands to lose the majority of their wealth should the industrial world fall..."
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор Драйвстем выдерживает паузу, осмысляя услышанное.{/n} "Сколь прискорбная весть, Ваша Светлость... полагаю, род Гапрак ждет официальное расследование? Напомню, что они находятся в особо близких сношениях с {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g} и оказывают протекцию Кьяве Гамма. Не пытаюсь оправдать преступников, Ваша Светлость, однако мне видится, что вспышка ереси на Кьяве едва ли может быть деянием благородного семейства, теряющего с утратой индустриального мира львиную долю своего богатства..."

If I may remind you, they have particularly close ties to the Adeptus Mechanicus and serve as patrons of Kiava Gamma. Not to speak in the defense of criminals, {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but from where I stand, the outbreak of heresy on Kiava could hardly have been perpetrated by a noble family who stands to lose the majority of their wealth should the industrial world fall..."

If I may remind you, they have particularly close ties to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} and serve as patrons of Kiava Gamma. Not to speak in the defence of criminals, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but from where I stand, the outbreak of heresy on Kiava could hardly have been perpetrated by a noble family who stands to lose the majority of their wealth should the industrial world fall..."

languages.text: {n}德莱夫斯塔顿了顿，掂量着你说的这句话的严重性。{/n}“这真是个令人难过的消息，大人……我想，应该是要对贾帕克家族展开官方调查吧？不知我能否提醒您一下，他们与{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的关系非常密切，而且他们还是基亚瓦伽马星的庇护者。我并不是想为罪犯开脱，大人，但站在我的立场来看，基亚瓦的异端暴乱，不太可能是由他们引起的。因为一旦那个工业世界垮台，他们会失去绝大部分财富。像这样的贵族家族，不太可能会做出这种事情……”
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem pauses, mulling over the gravity of your words.{/n} "Such woeful tidings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I assume that House Gaprak is in for an official investigation? If I may remind you, they have particularly close ties to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} and serve as patrons of Kiava Gamma. Not to speak in the defence of criminals, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but from where I stand, the outbreak of heresy on Kiava could hardly have been perpetrated by a noble family who stands to lose the majority of their wealth should the industrial world fall..."

traits.locale_text: {n}德莱夫斯塔顿了顿，掂量着你说的这句话的严重性。{/n}“这真是个令人难过的消息，大人……我想，应该是要对贾帕克家族展开官方调查吧？不知我能否提醒您一下，他们与{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的关系非常密切，而且他们还是基亚瓦伽马星的庇护者。我并不是想为罪犯开脱，大人，但站在我的立场来看，基亚瓦的异端暴乱，不太可能是由他们引起的。因为一旦那个工业世界垮台，他们会失去绝大部分财富。像这样的贵族家族，不太可能会做出这种事情……”

languages.text: {n}Drivestem se detiene, contemplando la gravedad de tus palabras.{/n} «Son noticias espantosas, mi{mf|lord|lady}... ¿Puedo suponer que se investigará oficialmente a la casa Gaprak? Si me lo permite, quiero recordarle que tienen una relación muy estrecha con el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} y sirven como mecenas de Kiava Gamma. No es mi intención defender a criminales, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero desde mi perspectiva no tiene sentido que este brote de herejía en Kiava sea obra de una familia noble que se arriesga a perder la mayor parte de sus riquezas si el mundo industrial cae...».
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem pauses, mulling over the gravity of your words.{/n} "Such woeful tidings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I assume that House Gaprak is in for an official investigation? If I may remind you, they have particularly close ties to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} and serve as patrons of Kiava Gamma. Not to speak in the defence of criminals, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but from where I stand, the outbreak of heresy on Kiava could hardly have been perpetrated by a noble family who stands to lose the majority of their wealth should the industrial world fall..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem se detiene, contemplando la gravedad de tus palabras.{/n} «Son noticias espantosas, mi{mf|lord|lady}... ¿Puedo suponer que se investigará oficialmente a la casa Gaprak? Si me lo permite, quiero recordarle que tienen una relación muy estrecha con el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} y sirven como mecenas de Kiava Gamma. No es mi intención defender a criminales, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero desde mi perspectiva no tiene sentido que este brote de herejía en Kiava sea obra de una familia noble que se arriesga a perder la mayor parte de sus riquezas si el mundo industrial cae...».

languages.text: {n}ドライブステムは言葉の重みを咀嚼するかのように話をやめた。{/n}「なんという悲劇でしょう、陛下…ガプラク家は正式な調査を受けているのでしょうか？そういえば、彼らは{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}と深い関係にあり、キアヴァ・ガンマの後援者でもあります。陛下、犯罪者を擁護するわけではありませんが、私の立場から言わせてもらうとキアヴァで異端が発生したのは、産業惑星が崩壊すればほとんどの財産を失うことになる貴族のせいだとは思えません…」
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem pauses, mulling over the gravity of your words.{/n} "Such woeful tidings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I assume that House Gaprak is in for an official investigation? If I may remind you, they have particularly close ties to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} and serve as patrons of Kiava Gamma. Not to speak in the defence of criminals, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but from where I stand, the outbreak of heresy on Kiava could hardly have been perpetrated by a noble family who stands to lose the majority of their wealth should the industrial world fall..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ドライブステムは言葉の重みを咀嚼するかのように話をやめた。{/n}「なんという悲劇でしょう、陛下…ガプラク家は正式な調査を受けているのでしょうか？そういえば、彼らは{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}と深い関係にあり、キアヴァ・ガンマの後援者でもあります。陛下、犯罪者を擁護するわけではありませんが、私の立場から言わせてもらうとキアヴァで異端が発生したのは、産業惑星が崩壊すればほとんどの財産を失うことになる貴族のせいだとは思えません…」

languages.text: {n}Drivestem denkt über die Tragweite deiner Worte nach.{/n} "Das sind schreckliche Nachrichten, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Ich nehme an, das Haus Gaprak erwartet eine offizielle Untersuchung? Ich möchte Euch daran erinnern, dass sie sehr enge Beziehungen zum {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} unterhalten und als Schutzpatrone von Kiava Gamma fungieren. Ich verteidige natürlich keine Verbrecher, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber aus meiner Sicht dürfte der Ausbruch der Ketzerei auf Kiava wohl kaum von einer Adelsfamilie ausgelöst worden sein, die einen Großteil ihres Wohlstands verlieren würde, falls die Produktionswelt untergeht ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem pauses, mulling over the gravity of your words.{/n} "Such woeful tidings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I assume that House Gaprak is in for an official investigation? If I may remind you, they have particularly close ties to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} and serve as patrons of Kiava Gamma. Not to speak in the defence of criminals, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but from where I stand, the outbreak of heresy on Kiava could hardly have been perpetrated by a noble family who stands to lose the majority of their wealth should the industrial world fall..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem denkt über die Tragweite deiner Worte nach.{/n} "Das sind schreckliche Nachrichten, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Ich nehme an, das Haus Gaprak erwartet eine offizielle Untersuchung? Ich möchte Euch daran erinnern, dass sie sehr enge Beziehungen zum {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} unterhalten und als Schutzpatrone von Kiava Gamma fungieren. Ich verteidige natürlich keine Verbrecher, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber aus meiner Sicht dürfte der Ausbruch der Ketzerei auf Kiava wohl kaum von einer Adelsfamilie ausgelöst worden sein, die einen Großteil ihres Wohlstands verlieren würde, falls die Produktionswelt untergeht ..."

languages.text: {n}Drivestem marque une pause le temps d'assimiler la gravité de vos propos.{/n} « Voilà une bien triste nouvelle, Votre Seigneurie... J'en déduis que la maison Gaprak doit s'attendre à une enquête approfondie ? Bien sûr, Kiava Gamma est sous sa protection, mais elle entretient aussi des liens très étroits avec l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Je n'ai pas pour habitude de défendre des criminels, Votre Seigneurie, mais je doute qu'une maison noble dont la fortune dépend quasi entièrement de ce monde industriel puisse avoir sciemment encouragé l'émergence de l'hérésie dans son propre jardin... »
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem pauses, mulling over the gravity of your words.{/n} "Such woeful tidings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I assume that House Gaprak is in for an official investigation? If I may remind you, they have particularly close ties to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} and serve as patrons of Kiava Gamma. Not to speak in the defence of criminals, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but from where I stand, the outbreak of heresy on Kiava could hardly have been perpetrated by a noble family who stands to lose the majority of their wealth should the industrial world fall..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem marque une pause le temps d'assimiler la gravité de vos propos.{/n} « Voilà une bien triste nouvelle, Votre Seigneurie... J'en déduis que la maison Gaprak doit s'attendre à une enquête approfondie ? Bien sûr, Kiava Gamma est sous sa protection, mais elle entretient aussi des liens très étroits avec l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Je n'ai pas pour habitude de défendre des criminels, Votre Seigneurie, mais je doute qu'une maison noble dont la fortune dépend quasi entièrement de ce monde industriel puisse avoir sciemment encouragé l'émergence de l'hérésie dans son propre jardin... »

languages.text: {n}Drivestem duraksıyor, söylediklerinin ağırlığı üzerine düşünüyor.{/n} "Son derece üzüntü verici bir haber {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Gaprak Hanesi'nin resmî bir soruşturma altında olduğunu varsayıyorum? Onların özellikle {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus'la{/g} yakın bağlara sahip olup Kiava Gama'nın hamisi olduklarını hatırlatmak isterim. Suçluları savunmak olarak algılamayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ancak görüşüm; Kiava'da baş gösteren kâfirliğin sorumlusunun, sınai dünya düştüğü takdirde servetinin büyük bir kısmını kaybedecek olan soylu aile olma ihtimali olmadığı yönünde."
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem pauses, mulling over the gravity of your words.{/n} "Such woeful tidings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I assume that House Gaprak is in for an official investigation? If I may remind you, they have particularly close ties to the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} and serve as patrons of Kiava Gamma. Not to speak in the defence of criminals, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but from where I stand, the outbreak of heresy on Kiava could hardly have been perpetrated by a noble family who stands to lose the majority of their wealth should the industrial world fall..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem duraksıyor, söylediklerinin ağırlığı üzerine düşünüyor.{/n} "Son derece üzüntü verici bir haber {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Gaprak Hanesi'nin resmî bir soruşturma altında olduğunu varsayıyorum? Size onların {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} ile özellikle yakın bağlara sahip olduklarını ve Kiava Gama'nın yöneticiliği görevinde olduklarını hatırlatmak isterim. Suçluları savunmak olarak algılamayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ancak görüşüm şudur ki; Kiava'da baş gösteren kâfirliğin sorumlusunun, sınai dünya düştüğü takdirde servetinin büyük bir kısmını kaybedecek olan bir soylu aile olma ihtimali pek yok."
